dialog: Let's start. AIRW-7, are your communication channels open?

That's great. Your systems seem to have booted correctly, so we'll start with some simple training.
We need to ensure everything works before the start of your mission.
This shouldn't take long.

Shortly your sensors will transfer you to a simulated world environment.
At this stage yopu will only have control of the lights

Read the mission objectives on the bottom right and complete this trivial task
. Press the enter key to start simulation
